name: Whisper Transcription
description: Hold Option+/ to record and auto-paste transcription using Groq's Whisper API
author: mohil

name: Gemini OCR
description: Cmd+Shift+S to OCR screenshot via Google Gemini API and auto-paste extracted text
author: mohil

name: Spotify Lyrics
description: Floating Spotify lyrics overlay that syncs with currently playing track
author: mohil

name: Trimmy
description: Automatically flattens multi-line command clipboard contents for easy pasting in terminal
author: mohil
